welcome_message_body: Welcome to Arvada! This charming city is known for its historic old town, beautiful parks, and vibrant community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Arvada has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Lot One
restaurants.description: Lot One is a restaurant located in Arvada.

restaurants.name: Jack's Bar & Grill
restaurants.description: Jack's Bar & Grill is a american restaurant located in Arvada.

restaurants.name: Sushi Aji
restaurants.description: Sushi Aji is a japanese restaurant located in Arvada.

restaurants.name: Das Meyer Fine Pastry Chalet
restaurants.description: Das Meyer Fine Pastry Chalet is a bakery located in Arvada.

restaurants.name: Mika Sushi
restaurants.description: Mika Sushi is a sushi restaurant located in Arvada.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Erie Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Erie Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boulder Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boulder Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Jeppesen Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Denver International Airport, housing ticketing, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: A Gates
terminals.description: One of three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving primarily United Airlines and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: B Gates
terminals.description: One of three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving primarily Southwest Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: C Gates
terminals.description: One of three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving primarily American Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection in certain areas.
